Prerequisite: 21st level, Swordmage

Benefit: When you use your Swordmage Aegis power, you can choose to mark any number of targets within burst.

Revision (10/13/2009)

In the first sentence of the Benefit line, replace "aegis of shielding power or aegis of assault power" with "Swordmage Aegis power."

Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 139.
